metadata.name: Dumping of Sensitive Hives Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of "reg.exe" in order to dump sensitive registry hives. This includes SAM, SYSTEM and SECURITY hives.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' save ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' export ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ˢave ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' eˣport '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hklm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hk˪m')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_local_machine')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_˪ocal_machine')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_loca˪_machine')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hkey_˪oca˪_machine'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\system')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\sam')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\security')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\ˢystem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\syˢtem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\ˢyˢtem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\ˢam')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\ˢecurity'))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of "reg.exe" in order to dump sensitive registry hives. This includes SAM, SYSTEM and SECURITY hives.

metadata.objective: False positive: Dumping hives for legitimate purpouse i.e. backup or forensic investigation References: https://www.slideshare.net/heirhabarov/hunting-for-credentials-dumping-in-windows-environment, https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/aed95fc6-5e3f-49dc-8b35-06508613f979.html, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1003/T1003.md, https://www.wietzebeukema.nl/blog/windows-command-line-obfuscation, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1003.002/T1003.002.md#atomic-test-1---registry-dump-of-sam-creds-and-secrets
